Synopsis: New Jersey mob boss Tony Soprano deals with personal and professional issues in his home and business life that affect his mental state, leading him to seek professional psychiatric counseling.

Title: The Great
Cast: Stars:, Elle Fanning, , Phoebe Fox, , Gwilym Lee, , Adam Godley
Synopsis: A royal woman living in rural Russia during the 18th century is forced to choose between her own personal happiness and the future of Russia, when she marries an Emperor.

Title: Shameless
Cast: Stars:, Emmy Rossum, , William H. Macy, , Ethan Cutkosky, , Jeremy Allen White
Synopsis: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

Title: Manifest
Cast: Stars:, Melissa Roxburgh, , Josh Dallas, , J.R. Ramirez, , Luna Blaise
Synopsis: When a commercial airliner suddenly reappears after being missing for five years, those aboard must reintegrate into society.

Title: Poker Face
Cast: Stars:, Natasha Lyonne, , Benjamin Bratt, , Simon Helberg, , Pedro Hollywood
Synopsis: Charlie has an extraordinary ability to determine when someone is lying. She hits the road with her Plymouth Barracuda and with every stop encounters a new cast of characters and strange crimes she can't help but investigate and solve.

Title: Band of Brothers
Cast: Stars:, Scott Grimes, , Damian Lewis, , Ron Livingston, , Shane Taylor
Synopsis: The story of Easy Company of the U.S. Army 101st Airborne Division and their mission in World War II Europe, from Operation Overlord to V-J Day.

Title: S.W.A.T.
Cast: Stars:, Shemar Moore, , Alex Russell, , Kenny Johnson, , Jay Harrington
Synopsis: Follows a locally born and bred S.W.A.T. sergeant and his team of highly-trained men and women as they solve crimes in Los Angeles.

Title: Jack Ryan
Cast: Stars:, John Krasinski, , Wendell Pierce, , Michael Kelly, , Abbie Cornish
Synopsis: Up-and-coming CIA analyst, Jack Ryan, is thrust into dangerous field assignments.

Title: Beef
Cast: Stars:, Steven Yeun, , Ali Wong, , Joseph Lee, , Young Mazino
Synopsis: Two people let a road rage incident burrow into their minds and slowly consume their every thought and action.

Title: A Small Light
Cast: Stars:, Bel Powley, , Joe Cole, , Amira Casar, , Billie Boullet
Synopsis: Follows the remarkable story of Miep Gies, a Dutch woman who risked her life to shelter Anne Frank's family from the Nazis for more than two years during World War II.

Cast: Stars:, Nicholas Braun, , Brian Cox, , Kieran Culkin, , Peter Friedman

Synopsis: American college football coach Ted Lasso heads to London to manage AFC Richmond, a struggling English Premier League football team.

Title: Silo
Cast: Stars:, Rebecca Ferguson, , Tim Robbins, , Common, , Harriet Walter

Synopsis: Sheriff Deputy Rick Grimes wakes up from a coma to learn the world is in ruins and must lead a group of survivors to stay alive.

Title: The Rookie
Cast: Stars:, Nathan Fillion, , Alyssa Diaz, , Richard T. Jones, , Melissa O'Neil
Synopsis: Starting over isn't easy, especially for John Nolan who, after a life-altering incident, is pursuing his dream of joining the LAPD. As their oldest rookie, he's met with skepticism from those who see him as just a walking midlife crisis.

Title: Better Call Saul
Cast: Stars:, Bob Odenkirk, , Rhea Seehorn, , Jonathan Banks, , Patrick Fabian
Synopsis: The trials and tribulations of criminal lawyer Jimmy McGill in the years leading up to his fateful run-in with Walter White and Jesse Pinkman.

Title: Grey's Anatomy
Cast: Stars:, Ellen Pompeo, , Chandra Wilson, , James Pickens Jr., , Justin Chambers
Synopsis: A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors.

Title: A Man Called Otto
Cast: Director:, Marc Forster, | ,     Stars:, Tom Hanks, , Mariana Treviño, , Rachel Keller, , John Higgins
Synopsis: Otto is a grump who's given up on life following the loss of his wife and wants to end it all. When a young family moves in nearby, he meets his match in quick-witted Marisol, leading to a friendship that will turn his world around.

Title: The Last of Us
Cast: Stars:, Pedro Pascal, , Bella Ramsey, , Anna Torv, , Lamar Johnson
Synopsis: After a global pandemic destroys civilization, a hardened survivor takes charge of a 14-year-old girl who may be humanity's last hope.

Title: Stranger Things
Cast: Stars:, Millie Bobby Brown, , Finn Wolfhard, , Winona Ryder, , David Harbour
Synopsis: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces in order to get him back.

Title: XO, Kitty
Cast: Stars:, Anna Cathcart, , Minyeong Choi, , Gia Kim, , Sang Heon Lee
Synopsis: A new love story unfolds when teen matchmaker Kitty reunites with her long-distance boyfriend at the same boarding school attended by her late mother.

Title: The Night Agent
Cast: Stars:, Gabriel Basso, , Luciane Buchanan, , Fola Evans-Akingbola, , Sarah Desjardins
Synopsis: Low-level FBI agent Peter Sutherland works in the basement of the White House manning a phone that never rings - until the night it does, propelling him into a conspiracy that leads all the way to the Oval Office.

Title: The Boys
Cast: Stars:, Karl Urban, , Jack Quaid, , Antony Starr, , Erin Moriarty
Synopsis: A group of vigilantes set out to take down corrupt superheroes who abuse their superpowers.

Title: Turn of the Tide
Cast: Stars:, José Condessa, , Helena Caldeira, , André Leitão, , Rodrigo Tomás
Synopsis: Four friends whose lives changed forever with the arrival of a ton of cocaine.

Title: Fake Profile
Cast: Stars:, Carolina Miranda, , Rodolfo Salas, , Juanse Díez, , Manuela González
Synopsis: Camila creates a sexy profile on the online dating app Spice looking for the man of her dreams. But her dreams quickly turn into nightmares, and Camila ends up falling into a web of sex, lies, and deception.

Title: Fatal Attraction
Cast: Stars:, Joshua Jackson, , Lizzy Caplan, , Amanda Peet, , Toby Huss
Synopsis: A deep-dive reimagining of the classic 80's thriller, exploring timeless themes of marriage and infidelity through the lens of modern attitudes toward strong women, personality disorders and coercive control.

Title: The Sopranos
Cast: Stars:, James Gandolfini, , Lorraine Bracco, , Edie Falco, , Michael Imperioli
Synopsis: New Jersey mob boss Tony Soprano deals with personal and professional issues in his home and business life that affect his mental state, leading him to seek professional psychiatric counseling.

Title: The Great
Cast: Stars:, Elle Fanning, , Phoebe Fox, , Gwilym Lee, , Adam Godley
Synopsis: A royal woman living in rural Russia during the 18th century is forced to choose between her own personal happiness and the future of Russia, when she marries an Emperor.

Title: Shameless
Cast: Stars:, Emmy Rossum, , William H. Macy, , Ethan Cutkosky, , Jeremy Allen White
Synopsis: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

Title: Manifest
Cast: Stars:, Melissa Roxburgh, , Josh Dallas, , J.R. Ramirez, , Luna Blaise
Synopsis: When a commercial airliner suddenly reappears after being missing for five years, those aboard must reintegrate into society.

Title: Poker Face
Cast: Stars:, Natasha Lyonne, , Benjamin Bratt, , Simon Helberg, , Pedro Hollywood
Synopsis: Charlie has an extraordinary ability to determine when someone is lying. She hits the road with her Plymouth Barracuda and with every stop encounters a new cast of characters and strange crimes she can't help but investigate and solve.

Title: Band of Brothers
Cast: Stars:, Scott Grimes, , Damian Lewis, , Ron Livingston, , Shane Taylor
Synopsis: The story of Easy Company of the U.S. Army 101st Airborne Division and their mission in World War II Europe, from Operation Overlord to V-J Day.

Title: S.W.A.T.
Cast: Stars:, Shemar Moore, , Alex Russell, , Kenny Johnson, , Jay Harrington
Synopsis: Follows a locally born and bred S.W.A.T. sergeant and his team of highly-trained men and women as they solve crimes in Los Angeles.

Title: Jack Ryan
Cast: Stars:, John Krasinski, , Wendell Pierce, , Michael Kelly, , Abbie Cornish
Synopsis: Up-and-coming CIA analyst, Jack Ryan, is thrust into dangerous field assignments.

Title: Beef
Cast: Stars:, Steven Yeun, , Ali Wong, , Joseph Lee, , Young Mazino
Synopsis: Two people let a road rage incident burrow into their minds and slowly consume their every thought and action.

Title: A Small Light

Synopsis: Follows the remarkable story of Miep Gies, a Dutch woman who risked her life to shelter Anne Frank's family from the Nazis for more than two years during World War II.

Synopsis: American college football coach Ted Lasso heads to London to manage AFC Richmond, a struggling English Premier League football team.

Synopsis: Unravel the mystery of a city in middle U.S.A. that imprisons everyone who enters. As the residents struggle to maintain a sense of normalcy and seek a way out, they must also survive the threats of the surrounding forest.

Synopsis: A deep-dive reimagining of the classic 80's thriller, exploring timeless themes of marriage and infidelity through the lens of modern attitudes toward strong women, personality disorders and coercive control.

Title: The Sopranos
Cast: Stars:, James Gandolfini, , Lorraine Bracco, , Edie Falco, , Michael Imperioli
Synopsis: New Jersey mob boss Tony Soprano deals with personal and professional issues in his home and business life that affect his mental state, leading him to seek professional psychiatric counseling.

Title: The Great
Cast: Stars:, Elle Fanning, , Phoebe Fox, , Gwilym Lee, , Adam Godley
Synopsis: A royal woman living in rural Russia during the 18th century is forced to choose between her own personal happiness and the future of Russia, when she marries an Emperor.

Title: Shameless
Cast: Stars:, Emmy Rossum, , William H. Macy, , Ethan Cutkosky, , Jeremy Allen White
Synopsis: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

Title: Manifest
Cast: Stars:, Melissa Roxburgh, , Josh Dallas, , J.R. Ramirez, , Luna Blaise
Synopsis: When a commercial airliner suddenly reappears after being missing for five years, those aboard must reintegrate into society.

Title: Poker Face
Cast: Stars:, Natasha Lyonne, , Benjamin Bratt, , Simon Helberg, , Pedro Hollywood
Synopsis: Charlie has an extraordinary ability to determine when someone is lying. She hits the road with her Plymouth Barracuda and with every stop encounters a new cast of characters and strange crimes she can't help but investigate and solve.

Cast: Stars:, Scott Grimes, , Damian Lewis, , Ron Livingston, , Shane Taylor

Synopsis: Follows a locally born and bred S.W.A.T. sergeant and his team of highly-trained men and women as they solve crimes in Los Angeles.

Title: Jack Ryan

Synopsis: Up-and-coming CIA analyst, Jack Ryan, is thrust into dangerous field assignments.

Title: Beef

Title: Fake Profile
Cast: Stars:, Carolina Miranda, , Rodolfo Salas, , Juanse Díez, , Manuela González
Synopsis: Camila creates a sexy profile on the online dating app Spice looking for the man of her dreams. But her dreams quickly turn into nightmares, and Camila ends up falling into a web of sex, lies, and deception.

Title: Fatal Attraction
Cast: Stars:, Joshua Jackson, , Lizzy Caplan, , Amanda Peet, , Toby Huss
Synopsis: A deep-dive reimagining of the classic 80's thriller, exploring timeless themes of marriage and infidelity through the lens of modern attitudes toward strong women, personality disorders and coercive control.

Title: The Sopranos
Cast: Stars:, James Gandolfini, , Lorraine Bracco, , Edie Falco, , Michael Imperioli
Synopsis: New Jersey mob boss Tony Soprano deals with personal and professional issues in his home and business life that affect his mental state, leading him to seek professional psychiatric counseling.

Title: The Great
Cast: Stars:, Elle Fanning, , Phoebe Fox, , Gwilym Lee, , Adam Godley

Synopsis: When a commercial airliner suddenly reappears after being missing for five years, those aboard must reintegrate into society.

Synopsis: After being struck by lightning, Barry Allen wakes up from his coma to discover he's been given the power of super speed, becoming the Flash, and fighting crime in Central City.

Title: The Blacklist
Cast: Stars:, James Spader, , Megan Boone, , Diego Klattenhoff, , Ryan Eggold
Synopsis: A new FBI profiler, Elizabeth Keen, has her entire life uprooted when a mysterious criminal, Raymond Reddington, who has eluded capture for decades, turns himself in and insists on speaking only to her.

Title: White House Plumbers
Cast: Stars:, Woody Harrelson, , Justin Theroux, , Lena Headey, , Domhnall Gleeson
Synopsis: A five-part series that tells the true story of how Nixon's own political saboteurs and Watergate masterminds, E. Howard Hunt and G. Gordon Liddy, accidentally toppled the presidency they were trying to protect.

Title: The Walking Dead
Cast: Stars:, Andrew Lincoln, , Norman Reedus, , Melissa McBride, , Lauren Cohan
Synopsis: Sheriff Deputy Rick Grimes wakes up from a coma to learn the world is in ruins and must lead a group of survivors to stay alive.

Title: The Rookie
Cast: Stars:, Nathan Fillion, , Alyssa Diaz, , Richard T. Jones, , Melissa O'Neil
Synopsis: Starting over isn't easy, especially for John Nolan who, after a life-altering incident, is pursuing his dream of joining the LAPD. As their oldest rookie, he's met with skepticism from those who see him as just a walking midlife crisis.

Title: Better Call Saul
Cast: Stars:, Bob Odenkirk, , Rhea Seehorn, , Jonathan Banks, , Patrick Fabian
Synopsis: The trials and tribulations of criminal lawyer Jimmy McGill in the years leading up to his fateful run-in with Walter White and Jesse Pinkman.

Title: Grey's Anatomy
Cast: Stars:, Ellen Pompeo, , Chandra Wilson, , James Pickens Jr., , Justin Chambers
Synopsis: A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors.

Title: A Man Called Otto
Cast: Director:, Marc Forster, | ,     Stars:, Tom Hanks, , Mariana Treviño, , Rachel Keller, , John Higgins
Synopsis: Otto is a grump who's given up on life following the loss of his wife and wants to end it all. When a young family moves in nearby, he meets his match in quick-witted Marisol, leading to a friendship that will turn his world around.

Title: The Last of Us
Cast: Stars:, Pedro Pascal, , Bella Ramsey, , Anna Torv, , Lamar Johnson
Synopsis: After a global pandemic destroys civilization, a hardened survivor takes charge of a 14-year-old girl who may be humanity's last hope.

Title: Stranger Things
Cast: Stars:, Millie Bobby Brown, , Finn Wolfhard, , Winona Ryder, , David Harbour
Synopsis: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces in order to get him back.

Title: XO, Kitty
Cast: Stars:, Anna Cathcart, , Minyeong Choi, , Gia Kim, , Sang Heon Lee
Synopsis: A new love story unfolds when teen matchmaker Kitty reunites with her long-distance boyfriend at the same boarding school attended by her late mother.

Title: The Night Agent
Cast: Stars:, Gabriel Basso, , Luciane Buchanan, , Fola Evans-Akingbola, , Sarah Desjardins
Synopsis: Low-level FBI agent Peter Sutherland works in the basement of the White House manning a phone that never rings - until the night it does, propelling him into a conspiracy that leads all the way to the Oval Office.

Title: The Boys
Cast: Stars:, Karl Urban, , Jack Quaid, , Antony Starr, , Erin Moriarty
Synopsis: A group of vigilantes set out to take down corrupt superheroes who abuse their superpowers.

Title: Turn of the Tide
Cast: Stars:, José Condessa, , Helena Caldeira, , André Leitão, , Rodrigo Tomás
Synopsis: Four friends whose lives changed forever with the arrival of a ton of cocaine.

Title: Fake Profile
Cast: Stars:, Carolina Miranda, , Rodolfo Salas, , Juanse Díez, , Manuela González
Synopsis: Camila creates a sexy profile on the online dating app Spice looking for the man of her dreams. But her dreams quickly turn into nightmares, and Camila ends up falling into a web of sex, lies, and deception.

Title: Fatal Attraction
Cast: Stars:, Joshua Jackson, , Lizzy Caplan, , Amanda Peet, , Toby Huss
Synopsis: A deep-dive reimagining of the classic 80's thriller, exploring timeless themes of marriage and infidelity through the lens of modern attitudes toward strong women, personality disorders and coercive control.

Title: The Sopranos
Cast: Stars:, James Gandolfini, , Lorraine Bracco, , Edie Falco, , Michael Imperioli
Synopsis: New Jersey mob boss Tony Soprano deals with personal and professional issues in his home and business life that affect his mental state, leading him to seek professional psychiatric counseling.

Title: The Great
Cast: Stars:, Elle Fanning, , Phoebe Fox, , Gwilym Lee, , Adam Godley
Synopsis: A royal woman living in rural Russia during the 18th century is forced to choose between her own personal happiness and the future of Russia, when she marries an Emperor.

Title: Shameless
Cast: Stars:, Emmy Rossum, , William H. Macy, , Ethan Cutkosky, , Jeremy Allen White
Synopsis: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

Title: Manifest
Cast: Stars:, Melissa Roxburgh, , Josh Dallas, , J.R. Ramirez, , Luna Blaise
Synopsis: When a commercial airliner suddenly reappears after being missing for five years, those aboard must reintegrate into society.

Title: Poker Face
Cast: Stars:, Natasha Lyonne, , Benjamin Bratt, , Simon Helberg, , Pedro Hollywood
Synopsis: Charlie has an extraordinary ability to determine when someone is lying. She hits the road with her Plymouth Barracuda and with every stop encounters a new cast of characters and strange crimes she can't help but investigate and solve.

Title: Band of Brothers
Cast: Stars:, Scott Grimes, , Damian Lewis, , Ron Livingston, , Shane Taylor
Synopsis: The story of Easy Company of the U.S. Army 101st Airborne Division and their mission in World War II Europe, from Operation Overlord to V-J Day.

Title: S.W.A.T.
Cast: Stars:, Shemar Moore, , Alex Russell, , Kenny Johnson, , Jay Harrington
Synopsis: Follows a locally born and bred S.W.A.T. sergeant and his team of highly-trained men and women as they solve crimes in Los Angeles.

Title: Jack Ryan
Cast: Stars:, John Krasinski, , Wendell Pierce, , Michael Kelly, , Abbie Cornish
Synopsis: Up-and-coming CIA analyst, Jack Ryan, is thrust into dangerous field assignments.

Title: Beef
Cast: Stars:, Steven Yeun, , Ali Wong, , Joseph Lee, , Young Mazino
Synopsis: Two people let a road rage incident burrow into their minds and slowly consume their every thought and action.

Title: A Small Light
Cast: Stars:, Bel Powley, , Joe Cole, , Amira Casar, , Billie Boullet
Synopsis: Follows the remarkable story of Miep Gies, a Dutch woman who risked her life to shelter Anne Frank's family from the Nazis for more than two years during World War II.

Title: Supernatural
Cast: Stars:, Jared Padalecki, , Jensen Ackles, , Jim Beaver, , Misha Collins
Synopsis: Two brothers follow their father's footsteps as hunters, fighting evil supernatural beings of many kinds, including monsters, demons, and gods that roam the earth.

Title: To Catch a Killer
Cast: Director:, Damián Szifron, | ,     Stars:, Shailene Woodley, , Ben Mendelsohn, , Jovan Adepo, , Ralph Ineson
Synopsis: Baltimore. New Year's Eve. A talented but troubled police officer (Shailene Woodley) is recruited by the FBI's chief investigator (Ben Mendelsohn) to help profile and track down a disturbed individual terrorizing the city.

Title: Succession
Cast: Stars:, Nicholas Braun, , Brian Cox, , Kieran Culkin, , Peter Friedman
Synopsis: The Roy family is known for controlling the biggest media and entertainment company in the world. However, their world changes when their father steps down from the company.

Title: Ted Lasso
Cast: Stars:, Jason Sudeikis, , Brett Goldstein, , Brendan Hunt, , Nick Mohammed
Synopsis: American college football coach Ted Lasso heads to London to manage AFC Richmond, a struggling English Premier League football team.

Title: Barry
Cast: Stars:, Bill Hader, , Stephen Root, , Sarah Goldberg, , Anthony Carrigan
Synopsis: A hit man from the Midwest moves to Los Angeles and gets caught up in the city's theatre arts scene.

Title: Silo
Cast: Stars:, Rebecca Ferguson, , Tim Robbins, , Common, , Harriet Walter
Synopsis: Men and women live in a giant silo underground with several regulations which they believe are in place to protect them from the toxic and ruined world on the surface.

Title: From
Cast: Stars:, Scott McCord, , Harold Perrineau, , Catalina Sandino Moreno, , Eion Bailey
Synopsis: Unravel the mystery of a city in middle U.S.A. that imprisons everyone who enters. As the residents struggle to maintain a sense of normalcy and seek a way out, they must also survive the threats of the surrounding forest.

Title: The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel
Cast: Stars:, Rachel Brosnahan, , Alex Borstein, , Michael Zegen, , Marin Hinkle

Synopsis: A new love story unfolds when teen matchmaker Kitty reunites with her long-distance boyfriend at the same boarding school attended by her late mother.

Title: The Night Agent
Cast: Stars:, Gabriel Basso, , Luciane Buchanan, , Fola Evans-Akingbola, , Sarah Desjardins
Synopsis: Low-level FBI agent Peter Sutherland works in the basement of the White House manning a phone that never rings - until the night it does, propelling him into a conspiracy that leads all the way to the Oval Office.

Title: The Boys
Cast: Stars:, Karl Urban, , Jack Quaid, , Antony Starr, , Erin Moriarty
Synopsis: A group of vigilantes set out to take down corrupt superheroes who abuse their superpowers.

Title: Turn of the Tide
Cast: Stars:, José Condessa, , Helena Caldeira, , André Leitão, , Rodrigo Tomás
Synopsis: Four friends whose lives changed forever with the arrival of a ton of cocaine.

Title: Fake Profile
Cast: Stars:, Carolina Miranda, , Rodolfo Salas, , Juanse Díez, , Manuela González
Synopsis: Camila creates a sexy profile on the online dating app Spice looking for the man of her dreams. But her dreams quickly turn into nightmares, and Camila ends up falling into a web of sex, lies, and deception.

Title: Fatal Attraction
Cast: Stars:, Joshua Jackson, , Lizzy Caplan, , Amanda Peet, , Toby Huss
Synopsis: A deep-dive reimagining of the classic 80's thriller, exploring timeless themes of marriage and infidelity through the lens of modern attitudes toward strong women, personality disorders and coercive control.

Title: The Sopranos
Cast: Stars:, James Gandolfini, , Lorraine Bracco, , Edie Falco, , Michael Imperioli
Synopsis: New Jersey mob boss Tony Soprano deals with personal and professional issues in his home and business life that affect his mental state, leading him to seek professional psychiatric counseling.

Title: The Great
Cast: Stars:, Elle Fanning, , Phoebe Fox, , Gwilym Lee, , Adam Godley

Synopsis: When a commercial airliner suddenly reappears after being missing for five years, those aboard must reintegrate into society.

Title: Poker Face
